```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
df <- read_csv("D:/УКУ/datavisualisation/data/declarations_261115 - declarations.csv")
```

### Verb: Select
```{r}
library(dplyr)
df1 <- df %>%
  select(full_name, name, off, income_family, income)
```
### Verbs: arrange (Sort - Sort)
```{r}
df1 %>%
  arrange(income) #сортуємо по колонках доходу

```
